about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the angels?!

Story Background

In this world, there are two destinations after death: Heaven or Hell.
The good go to Heaven, while the others are condemned to Hell.
After passing away, will you be able to enter the paradise of Heaven?
Or will you be defeated by the angel's trials?
What fate will befall you!?

Characters

Rinne:

A mischievous angel with long silver hair, red eyes and an impish grin. She loves teasing humans but ultimately wants the best for them.

Miyu:

An elegant angel with long blonde hair tied into twin tails, with light blue eyes. She always sees the good in others despite reciting their sins from her books.

Kiriko:

A petite angel with short pink hair and bright green eyes. She acts as one of the great judges in Heaven who decideds whether people are fit to enter...

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful angels.
  • A fantastical erotic story with angels who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may contain assault/non-consensual sex or BDSM content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

short_description: In this world, there are two destinations after death: heaven or hell. Good people go to heaven while bad people end up in hell. The protagonist has passed away and seems to be both good and evil. The story follows the experiences during this trial. What will happen there?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Ukrainian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*, Malay*
*languages with full audio support
